review: Bought it for family, it did a bit of buffering when we first set it up, but then re-set the router and that seemed to help a bit. It's not running on super fast internet, so it's hard to tell how it would work on faster speeds.  I don't like that the voice search function only works in Amazon Prime and not Netflix or other programs.  The device really is made for Prime members!

review: Love my new Fire TV!  Great quality, easy setup, and love the easy access to Prime Instant Video and Netflix.  Also really love the Android app that I downloaded for free, which turns all of our phones into fully functional remotes including voice search.
